Definition at line 68 of file kernel.h.

Field Documentation

struct { ... } thread::data

Referenced by initialize(), thread_queue_dequeue(), and thread_queue_enqueue().

unsigned long thread::list_data

This member variable has different meaning depending on what list the thread resides in.

In the timer queue this variable is either an absolute time or a delta time.

Definition at line 83 of file kernel.h.

int thread::next

This is an index into the thread_table.

The index corresponds to the thread following this thread in a linked list. A thread can be in a number of linked lists.

Definition at line 78 of file kernel.h.

Referenced by thread_queue_dequeue(), and thread_queue_enqueue().

int thread::owner

An index, into the process table, that identifies the process that owns this thread.

char thread::padding[1024]

Definition at line 89 of file kernel.h.

struct context thread::registers

The context of the thread.

Note: the context of the thread could include more than the accessible registers.
